name: Different Past Perfect, Past Continious, Present Perfect

phrases.en: I’ve always wanted to visit an English-speaking country

phrases.en: I told him that I had always wanted to go to an English-speaking country

phrases.en: When he explained everything to me, I realized that I had made a mistake

phrases.en: Time was passing very slowly. We were waiting and waiting. Everything was very uncertain

phrases.en: I haven't reached a strong Intermediate level in English yet but it's in my plans

phrases.en: I haven't reached an Intermediate level in English yet but I'm going to do it soon

phrases.en: I haven't achieved this aim yet but I'm going to do it in the near future

phrases.en: I haven't solved this problem yet but I'm going to do something about it in the near future

phrases.en: I've just got a message from him

phrases.en: Then I remembered that I had forgotten my keys at home

phrases.en: То be honest, I've always wanted to do something useful and meaningful in my life / full of meaning
